titleStmt.title: S. S. Patterson et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1670

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: We the undersined Union men of District No 5 Pendletn county Ky ast you in the names of many others to give to Wm Gardner a unflinching Union man the office of Magistrate in this district occson to fill the vacancy occassioned by the resignation of S. S. Patterson

S. S. Patterson
J. H. Dahlenburg
C. T. Daniel
Franklin Vallandingham
Ebens. S. Simpson
David Mileham
Joseph Mullins
Gabrel. Speagle.
George Speagle
W. W. Hydlott
William. Seales.
R. Mann
J. Vastine
James. Vastine
Teter. F. Grant
J. N. Dougherty
Thos. Hetmon
H. Dahlenburg
Wm. Gohlen
James Conley
R. Simpson
J. Simpson
E. Simpson
B. N. Wilson
W. Midleton
S. Tomblin
Wm. Tomblin
T. Winn
C. Whitesides
James. Piner
Wm. oliver
Amon. Reynolds
J. T. Vallandingham
Wm. Gardner
